title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Digging Into Public Records How to make government actually work FOR YOU!
description: Norberto Santana Jr. provides tips for accessing public records, including knowing the target agency, being familiar with the relevant laws, determining the scope of the request, understanding records retention policies, persisting through delays and dealing with fees, and seeking confrontation or creative solutions when necessary.
